TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Immutable class to store the recommended stream configurations to set up android.view.Surface Surfaces for creating a android.hardware.camera2.CameraCaptureSession capture session with android.hardware.camera2.CameraDevice#createCaptureSession.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Util.Size> GetHighResolutionOutputSizes(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get a list of supported high resolution sizes, which cannot operate at full BURST_CAPTURE rate.
Docs.returns: a non-modifiable set of supported slower high-resolution sizes, or null if the BURST_CAPTURE capability is not supported

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Util.Range> GetHighSpeedVideoFpsRangesFor(class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: one of the sizes returned by #getHighSpeedVideoSizes()
Docs.summary: Get the frame per second ranges (fpsMin, fpsMax) for input high speed video size.
Docs.returns: a non-modifiable set of supported high speed video recording FPS ranges The upper bound of returned ranges is guaranteed to be greater than or equal to 120.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Util.Size> GetHighSpeedVideoSizesFor(class Android.Util.Range fpsRange) cil managed

Docs.param: one of the FPS ranges returned by #getHighSpeedVideoFpsRanges()
Docs.summary: Get the supported video sizes for an input high speed FPS range.
Docs.returns: A non-modifiable set of video sizes to create high speed capture sessions for high speed streaming use cases.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Util.Size> GetInputSizes(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get the supported input sizes for this input format.
Docs.returns: a non-modifiable set of sizes, or null if the format was not available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetOutputMinFrameDuration (Java.Lang.Class klass, Android.Util.Size size);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 GetOutputMinFrameDuration(class Java.Lang.Class klass, class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: a class which has a non-empty array returned by #getOutputSizes(Class)
Docs.summary: Get the minimum CaptureRequest#SENSOR_FRAME_DURATION frame duration for the class/size combination (in nanoseconds).
Docs.returns: a minimum frame duration > 0 in nanoseconds, or 0 if the minimum frame duration is not available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetOutputMinFrameDuration (int format, Android.Util.Size size);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 GetOutputMinFrameDuration(int32 format, class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: an image format from ImageFormat or PixelFormat
Docs.summary: Get the minimum android.hardware.camera2.CaptureRequest#SENSOR_FRAME_DURATION frame duration for the format/size combination (in nanoseconds).
Docs.returns: a minimum frame duration > 0 in nanoseconds, or 0 if the minimum frame duration is not available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Util.Size> GetOutputSizes(class Java.Lang.Class klass) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get a list of sizes compatible with klass to use as an output.
Docs.returns: a non-modifiable set of supported sizes for ImageFormat#PRIVATE format, or null if the klass is not a supported output.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Util.Size> GetOutputSizes(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.param: an image format from ImageFormat or PixelFormat
Docs.summary: Get a list of sizes compatible with the requested image format.
Docs.returns: a non-modifiable set of supported sizes, or null if the format is not a supported output

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetOutputStallDuration (Java.Lang.Class klass, Android.Util.Size size);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 GetOutputStallDuration(class Java.Lang.Class klass, class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: a class which has a non-empty array returned by #getOutputSizes(Class).
Docs.summary: Get the stall duration for the class/size combination (in nanoseconds).
Docs.returns: a minimum frame duration > 0 in nanoseconds, or 0 if the stall duration is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Java.Lang.Integer> GetValidOutputFormatsForInput(valuetype Android.Graphics.ImageFormatType inputFormat) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get the image format output formats for a reprocessing input format.
Docs.returns: a non-modifiable set of Integer formats

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsOutputSupportedFor(class Android.Views.Surface surface) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determine whether or not the surface in its current state is suitable to be included in a CameraDevice#createCaptureSession capture session as an output.
Docs.returns: true if this is supported, false otherwise

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsOutputSupportedFor(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.param: an image format from either ImageFormat or PixelFormat
Docs.summary: Determine whether or not output surfaces with a particular user-defined format can be passed CameraDevice#createCaptureSession createCaptureSession.
Docs.returns: true if using a surface with this format will be supported with CameraDevice#createCaptureSession

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the use case value for the recommended stream configurations.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: If supported, the recommended 10-bit output stream configurations must include a subset of the advertised android.graphics.ImageFormat#YCBCR_P010 and android.graphics.ImageFormat#PRIVATE outputs that are optimized for power and performance when registered along with a supported 10-bit dynamic range profile.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: The recommended stream configuration map for use case low latency snapshot must contain subset of configurations with end-to-end latency that does not exceed 200 ms.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: The recommended stream configuration map for use case preview must contain a subset of efficient, non-stalling configurations that must include both android.graphics.ImageFormat#PRIVATE and android.graphics.ImageFormat#YUV_420_888 output formats.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: In case the device supports android.hardware.camera2.CameraMetadata#REQUEST_AVAILABLE_CAPABILITIES_RAW, the recommended stream configuration map for use case RAW must contain a subset of efficient configurations that include the android.graphics.ImageFormat#RAW_SENSOR and other RAW output formats.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: The recommended stream configuration map for recording must contain a subset of efficient video configurations that include android.graphics.ImageFormat#PRIVATE output format for at least all supported android.media.CamcorderProfile profiles.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: The recommended stream configuration map for use case snapshot must contain a subset of efficient still capture configurations that must include android.graphics.ImageFormat#JPEG output format and at least one configuration with size approximately equal to the sensor pixel array size CameraCharacteristics#SENSOR_INFO_ACTIVE_ARRAY_SIZE.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: The recommended stream configuration map for use case video snapshot must only contain a subset of efficient liveshot configurations that include android.graphics.ImageFormat#JPEG output format.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: In case the device supports CameraMetadata#REQUEST_AVAILABLE_CAPABILITIES_YUV_REPROCESSING and/or CameraMetadata#REQUEST_AVAILABLE_CAPABILITIES_PRIVATE_REPROCESSING, the recommended stream configuration map for use case ZSL must contain a subset of efficient configurations that include the suggested input and output format mappings.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
